name: Justine Qiu
long_title: Lead organizer and founder of TinoHacks

name: Davin Clark
long_title: Co-lead organizer and founder of TinoHacks

name: Kashyap Panda
long_title: iOS App Lead and Technology Director
description: Hello everyone! I am Kashyap Panda, and besides being the lead iOS Developer and Technology Director of TinoHacks, I am an aspiring computer scientist with a fondness for robots. Helping to organize this hackathon is an amazing experience for me.

name: Sriharsha G.
description: Hey, Sriharsha Guduguntla here. Besides being the Webmaster and Technology Director of TinoHacks, I'm an aspiring web developer and data science enthusiast who seeks to spread Computer Science among high schoolers in the Bay Area. By joining this team, my dream is finally coming true.

name: Shruthi Jaganathan
description: My name is Shruthi Jaganathan, I am on the sponsorship team. I really enjoy robotics and I joined this team because I thought it would be really cool to participate and help with a hackathon.

name: Shashank Mahesh
description: Hey, I'm Shashank Mahesh! I am on the Technology team, and I enjoy doing Android development and robotics. I joined this team because I enjoy going to hackathons myself, and I would like to have everyone experience one.

name: Ryan Liao
description: Hey, I'm Ryan Liao! I am on the Outreach Team, and in my free time, I enjoy playing outdoor sports such as basketball. By joining this team, I hope to spread computer science among a number of high schoolers in the bay area because I believe the programming community plays a crucial role in our society.
